entry.title: Planned maintenance on GitHub Package Registry
entry.content:
Feb 9, 09:09 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 8, 22:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 7, 11:52 UTC
Update - Due to planned maintenance on our infrastructure, we expect an interruption to GitHub Packages Registry that will last two minutes at an unconfirmed time during this 15 hour time window. If you experience interruption, please wait two minutes then try again.

Thank you for your patience while we complete this critical work.

Feb 7, 10:08 UTC
Scheduled - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

entry.title: Incident with Actions, Git Operations and Pages
entry.content:
Jan 19, 20:51 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 19, 20:11 UTC
Update - We have applied a mitigation that has reduced impact to Actions, but error rates are still elevated. We continue to work with our dependency team on additional mitigations.

Jan 19, 19:31 UTC
Update - We are aware of an issue that impacts Actions, resulting in slow or failed jobs. Root cause in a dependency is understood and we are working with that team on a mitigation.

Jan 19, 18:49 UTC
Update - We are aware of an issue that impacts Actions, resulting in slow or failed jobs. Root cause in a dependency is understood and we are working with that team on a mitigation.

Jan 19, 18:07 UTC
Update - We are aware of an issue that impacts Actions, resulting in slow or failed jobs. Root cause in a dependency is understood and we are working with that team on a mitigation.

Jan 19, 17:27 UTC
Update - We are aware of an issue that impacts Actions artifact uploads and downloads, causing slow or failed jobs. We are investigating the root cause and will provide updates as we learn more.

Jan 19, 16:54 UTC
Update - We are observing an issue that impacts Actions artifact uploads and downloads, causing slow or failed jobs. We are investigating the root cause and will provide updates as we learn more.

Jan 19, 16:52 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Jan 19, 16:49 UTC
Update - Git Operations is operating normally.

Jan 19, 16:09 UTC
Update - Pages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Jan 19, 15:57 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Git Operations.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Jan 16, 16:43 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 16, 16:31 UTC
Update - We found an issue that caused high database replication lag, leading to issues visible in multiple services. We have resolved this issue and are expecting services to become healthy once queues drain.

Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.
